articles.title: ‘Truly historic’: Undrafted $112m star smashes records as Nets trio win ‘game of the year’ - Fox Sports
articles.description: ‘Truly historic’: Undrafted $112m star smashes records as Nets trio win ‘game of the year’
articles.content:
Fred VanVleet has produced an inspired performance on both ends of the floor to power the Toronto Raptors to a 123-108 win over the Orlando Magic. 
It was a career-night for VanVleet, who shot an in… [+4796 chars]
